text: Mia Buric (born 23 May 1982) is a former German tennis player. She has won 3 singles and 2 doubles titles on the ITF tour in her career. Her career-high ranking is world number 204 was achieved in July 2000. Her highest ranking in doubles is world number 176 on 11 June 2001. Buric retired from professional tennis in 2003. == WTA career finals == === Doubles: 1 (0–1) === {| class="wikitable sortable mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" !Legend: Before 2009!!Legend: Starting in
